overview: From 2025-07-20 to 2025-07-27, elizaos-plugins/registry had 2 new PRs (1 merged), 0 new issues, and 6 active contributors.

topPRs.title: Add plugin-my to registry
topPRs.author: cuongpo
topPRs.body:
This PR adds plugin-my to the registry.

- Package name: plugin-my
- GitHub repository: github:cuongpo/plugin-my
- Version: 0.1.0
- Description: COTI blockchain plugin for ElizaOS - enables private token operations and encrypted transactions

Submitted by: @cuongpo

<!-- This is an auto-generated comment: release notes by coderabbit.ai -->

## Summary by CodeRabbit

* **New Features**
  * Added several new plugins and adapters, expanding available integrations.
* **Chores**
  * Updated plugin and adapter naming conventions for consistency.
  * Changed repository sources for some existing plugins.
  * Standardized and expanded the plugin index metadata.

<!-- end of auto-generated comment: release notes by coderabbit.ai -->
